group_1.textCenter: What did you call me out here for?
Juri.

group_1.textLeft: We're coming tonight.

group_1.textRight: You came all the way out here to tell@me that in person...?

group_1.textLeft: This mental warfare stuff isn't something@suited to Juri the Great.
That's why I came to tell you, so we@could start off on equal footing.
I'm not lying, we're coming tonight. Why@don't you head back and rally your team?

group_1.textRight: I hate to tell you, but our morale hasn't@fallen as much as you might think it has.

group_1.textLeft: That's great news.

group_1.textRight: Juri...this is your last chance to@turn back...

group_1.textLeft: You still think I'll stop just because@witches are reappearing in the city?
We've seen a few on our end, too.
But that could just be coincidence. There's@no guarantee they'll keep appearing.
There's hardly a reason for us to call@off the war at this point.

group_1.textRight: Enough about the witches. You're@really just after me, aren't you?
If we can avoid getting the others involved,@I don't mind fighting you here and now.

group_1.textLeft: That's a tempting offer, but@backing down now would make
Juri the Great look bad in front of Ryuugasaki.
I knew you'd refuse to fight me unless@I took things this far.
So I did everything I had to, which included@dragging all the other magical girls into this.

group_1.textRight: Why is it so important for you@to fight me...?

group_1.textLeft: It's in my nature.@You know that, don't you?
I've been a troublemaker since I was a kid. I@won't hesitate to fight if things don't go my way.
The more I have to wait for something,@the more I'll explode in the end.
It's caused a lot of trouble for my dad.

group_1.textRight: That's why I've always put up with@your attitude.

group_1.textLeft: I really do appreciate it.
You're the only one who can handle@the flames of Juri the Great.
But my loss to you has been burning inside of@me... I've been holding it in for a full year now.
And tonight, I can finally let that rage free.

group_1.textRight: It seems like I have no choice but@to face that rage head on...
Whoever loses, whatever happens,@no hard feelings.
Go all out so that you don't regret@a thing.

group_1.textCenter: Thanks, big sis.
For accepting my sick way of thinking.

group_1.textLeft: Don't forget the warmth of this@life, okay...?
The next time we meet,@I'll burn you down.

group_1.textRight: This tiger is going to crush that dragon.

group_1.textCenter: Don't hate, don't be jealous,@and don't be selfish.
Always work hard for others, and pray for@peace, both of the world and of yourself.
As much as I wanted to avoid war,@I'm going to fight anyway...
I swear I'll make this the last of them.
Is it wrong that I've chosen to fight...?

group_1.narration: "If this is the last one,@there's no other choice.@If war really can't be avoided,@then you have your answer."

group_1.textCenter: Right...
The tiger and dragon are about to clash...
But the snake will be the winner~
Listen up, the tiger and dragon are@about to start fighting~
I'm not sure exactly when,@but it'll be tonight.
Each team should contact you all before@then, so play along for now~
I'll send my instructions later.
So everyone, make sure you can@get my messages.
Okay~?
(Since Juri came all the way out to the bridge,@she must know about the gems...)
(Are they going to use the central@bridge like we planned,)
(or the West and East Oogibashi bridges...?)
(We should probably change our plan...)
